item.lampion_lendario.ability: Function: Grants total invisibility while held.
item.lampion_lendario.limitations: Limitations: Does not hide Elytra, sounds, or names from the Compass.
item.tridente_lendario.ability: Function: Applies Slowness and Mining Fatigue to the target. Summons lightning on rainy days.
item.tridente_lendario.limitations: Limitations: The summoned lightning destroys hit items.
tooltip.itensmod.hunters_sword: Transfers the Legendary Lantern from the slain player's inventory to yours.
item.picareta_lendaria.ability: Function: Instantly breaks stone and ore blocks.
item.picareta_lendaria.limitations: Limitations: Cannot collect Obsidian or Ancient Debris.
item.bota_lendaria.ability: Function: Grants infinite Speed V to the wearer.
item.bota_lendaria.limitations: Limitations: Nullified by the Legendary Fool's Potato.
item.batata_lendaria.ability: Function: Nullifies the Legendary Boots for any user.
item.batata_lendaria.limitations: Limitations: Applies Slowness V to the holder, even if not being held.
item.capacete_sol.ability: Function: Grants Strength V during the day.
item.capacete_sol.limitations: Limitations: Nullified by the Moon's Helm in the inventory.
item.capacete_lua.ability: Function: Grants Resistance V during the night.
item.capacete_lua.limitations: Limitations: Nullified by the Sun's Helm in the inventory.
chat.itensmod.lantern_acquired: The Legendary Lantern has been acquired!
chat.itensmod.lantern_lost: You were slain by the Hunter's Sword and lost the Legendary Lantern!
